thread.title: Portland Metro Tuesday Forecast: Less fog this morning; more sun this afternoon
thread.title_full: Portland Metro Tuesday Forecast: Less fog this morning; more sun this afternoon | OregonLive.com

author: Rosemarie Stein | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Portland Metro Tuesday Forecast: Less fog this morning; more sun this afternoon
text:
Tuesday might be a twin to Monday minus the heavy fog. Fog is forming as of 5:30 a.m. in areas west and south of the city. But the widespread fog event of yesterday is unlikely to repeat today.
Expect some high clouds through the morning and then full sun by early afternoon. Highs today should be a degree or two warmer topping out at 72.
Wednesday's temperatures should be similar with more clouds. On Thursday a thermal low begins to build causing an off shore flow and warmer temps. Forecasters are looking for Thursday and Friday to be warmer than average for this time of year.
The weekend, currently, looks rainy. Figures.
